title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: East Elk Creek
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     East Elk Creek                East Elk Creek Campground              East Elk Creek is a group campsite that can accommodate a total of 50 people. The site is located 16.5 miles west of Gunnison just north of U.S. Highway 50. The campsites are located under large Cottonwood trees and space is available for tents or RVs.     Approximate Open Dates: May to mid-October   Sites: 1 group site   Accessible Sites: no    Water:  yes, mid-May to mid-September    Flush Toilets:  no   Vault Toilets:  yes    Tables & Fire Grates: yes   Elevation:  7535 feet   Picnic Shelter:  yes             Reservation Information Reservations are required for East Elk Campground and must be made at least 3 days in advance.    Fees     Group Site $53.00
